trans-unit.target: 狀態 =\<變更 >

trans-unit.source: RowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal
trans-unit.target: RowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal

trans-unit.source: Values in a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> can be constrained through use of properties such as <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>可以藉由使用屬性這類限制<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會處理這類資料行與資料行的屬性所定義的行為一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: The read only constraint on a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is applicable only for changes that occur in memory.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的唯一條件約束上<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>只適用於記憶體中發生的變更。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法的覆寫唯讀資料行值，如有需要。

trans-unit.source: To determine which version of the primary key field to use for comparing the current row with an incoming row, the `Load` method uses the original version of the primary key value within a row, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪個版本的主索引鍵欄位，要用來比較目前的資料列，與內送的資料列，`Load`如果存在的話，方法會使用原始版本的資料列中的主索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `Load` method uses the current version of the primary key field.
trans-unit.target: 否則，`Load`方法會使用目前版本的主索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範數個呼叫的相關問題的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>, and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns.
trans-unit.target: 首先，此範例著重於結構描述問題，包括 推斷的結構描述從載入<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>，和不相容的結構描述和結構描述具有遺失或其他資料行，接著處理。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the `Load` method, displaying the data both before and after the load operation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫`Load`方法，顯示資料之前和之後載入作業。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> that provides one or more result sets.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />，提供一個或多個結果集。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <see cref="T:System.Data.LoadOption" /> enumeration that indicates how rows already in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> are combined with incoming rows that share the same primary key.
trans-unit.target: 來自 <see cref="T:System.Data.LoadOption" /> 列舉的值，指出已經在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的資料列如何與共用相同主索引鍵的傳入資料列結合。

trans-unit.source: Fills a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with values from a data source using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，用資料來源的值填滿 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see langword="DataTable" /> already contains rows, the incoming data from the data source is merged with the existing rows according to the value of the <paramref name="loadOption" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="DataTable" /> 已經包含資料列，從資料來源傳入的資料會根據 <paramref name="loadOption" /> 參數的值，與現有的資料列合併。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method consumes the first result set from the loaded <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>, and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會使用第一個結果集從載入<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>，並成功完成之後，讀取器的位置設下一個結果集，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 轉換資料時`Load`方法會使用相同的轉換規則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> instance: schema, data, and event operations.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法必須考慮到三個特定的問題時載入的資料從<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>執行個體： 結構描述、 資料和事件的作業。

trans-unit.source: When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 當使用結構描述，`Load`方法可能會遇到的條件下, 表中所述。

trans-unit.source: The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述作業進行的所有匯入的結果集，即使沒有包含資料。

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has no schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>沒有結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會根據來自匯入的結果集的結構描述<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>有結構描述，但它與載入結構描述不相容。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會擲回對應至特定錯誤的嘗試將資料載入至不相容的結構描述時，就會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that don't exist in the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述相容，但已載入的結果集結構描述包含資料行不存在於中`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method adds the extra columns to `DataTable`’s schema.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法加入額外的資料行，以`DataTable`的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and the loaded result set are not value compatible.
trans-unit.target: 在方法擲回例外狀況，如果對應中的資料行<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和載入的結果集不相容的值。

trans-unit.source: The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns.
trans-unit.target: 方法也會擷取結果集和所有加入的資料行的條件約束資訊。

trans-unit.source: Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current <xref:System.Data.DataTable> does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.
trans-unit.target: 此條件約束資訊的主索引鍵條件約束的情況下，除了用只有當目前<xref:System.Data.DataTable>不包含任何資料行，在載入作業的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述相容，但載入的結果集結構描述包含較少的資料行，比`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the `Load` method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or null value for the missing column.
trans-unit.target: 如果遺漏資料行已定義了預設值或資料行的資料類型可為 null，`Load`方法可讓資料列来加入，以取代遺失的資料行的預設值或 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If no default value or null can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用沒有預設值或 null，則`Load`方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the null value as the implied default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何特定的預設值，`Load`方法會使用隱含的預設值為 null 的值。

trans-unit.source: Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> maintains both the current value and the original value for each column.
trans-unit.target: 考慮的行為之前，先`Load`方法資料作業，請考慮每個資料列內<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會維護目前值和每個資料行的原始值。

trans-unit.source: These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可能會相等，或如果已變更過填滿的資料列中的資料可能會不同`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: See [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: In this method call, the specified <xref:System.Data.LoadOption> parameter influences the processing of the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 在這個方法呼叫中，指定<xref:System.Data.LoadOption>參數會影響連入資料的處理。

trans-unit.source: How should the Load method handle loading rows that have the same primary key as existing rows?
trans-unit.target: Load 方法應如何處理具有相同的主索引鍵為現有的資料列載入資料列？

trans-unit.source: Should it modify current values, original values, or both?
trans-unit.target: 它應該修改目前的值、 原始值，或兩者嗎？

trans-unit.source: These issues, and more, are controlled by the `loadOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這些問題，以及其他項目，皆受`loadOption`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row.
trans-unit.target: 如果現有的資料列和內送資料列包含對應的主索引鍵值，則會使用目前的資料列狀態值處理的資料列，否則它會被視為新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: In terms of event operations, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event occurs before each row is changed, and the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged> event occurs after each row has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 事件作業<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>之前變更每個資料列時，就會發生事件和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged>變更每個資料列之後，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs> instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，<xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的執行個體包含與事件相關聯的特定動作的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This action value varies, depending on the state of the row before the load operation.
trans-unit.target: 此動作的值會根據的資料列之前載入作業的狀態而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，這兩個事件發生，而且動作是針對每個相同。

trans-unit.source: The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state.
trans-unit.target: 此動作可套用到每個資料列，目前或原始版本或兩者，根據目前的資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following table displays behavior for the Load method when called with each of the `LoadOption` values, and also shows how the values interact with the row state for the row being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示與每個呼叫時，Load 方法的行為`LoadOption`值，然後也會顯示這些值載入的資料列的資料列狀態的互動。

trans-unit.source: The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row.
trans-unit.target: （標示為"（不會出現） 」） 的最後一個資料列描述不符合任何現有的資料列的內送資料列的行為。

trans-unit.source: Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> for the value after the `Load` method has completed.
trans-unit.target: 此資料表中的每個資料格會描述資料列中欄位的目前和原始值連同<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>後的值為`Load`方法已完成。

trans-unit.source: Values in a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> can be constrained through use of properties such as <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>可以藉由使用屬性這類限制<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會處理這類資料行與資料行的屬性所定義的行為一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: The read only constraint on a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is applicable only for changes that occur in memory.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的唯一條件約束上<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>只適用於記憶體中發生的變更。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法的覆寫唯讀資料行值，如有需要。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the OverwriteChanges or PreserveChanges options when calling the `Load` method, then the assumption is made that the incoming data is coming from the `DataTable`'s primary data source, and the DataTable tracks changes and can propagate the changes back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的 OverwriteChanges 或 PreserveChanges 選項呼叫時`Load`方法，則假設由內送資料來自`DataTable`的主要資料來源和資料表會追蹤變更，可以將傳播將變更傳回資料來源。

trans-unit.source: If you select the Upsert option, it is assumed that the data is coming from one of a secondary data source, such as data provided by a middle-tier component, perhaps altered by a user.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選取了選項，則會假設資料來自次要資料來源，例如資料由中介層元件，或許更改由使用者所提供的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the assumption is that the intent is to aggregate data from one or more data sources in the `DataTable`, and then perhaps propagate the data back to the primary data source.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，假設是目的是彙總資料一或多個資料來源中`DataTable`，，然後可能將傳播回主要資料來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.LoadOption> parameter is used for determining the specific version of the row that is to be used for primary key comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.LoadOption>參數用來判斷要用於主索引鍵比較的資料列的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: The table below provides the details.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Load option
trans-unit.target: 載入選項

trans-unit.source: DataRow version used for primary key comparison
trans-unit.target: 用於主索引鍵比較的 DataRow 版本

trans-unit.source: Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version
trans-unit.target: 原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本

trans-unit.source: Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version
trans-unit.target: 原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本

trans-unit.source: Current version, if it exists, otherwise Original version
trans-unit.target: 目前版本 （如果存在的話），否則原始版本

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範數個呼叫的相關問題的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>, and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns.
trans-unit.target: 首先，此範例著重於結構描述問題，包括 推斷的結構描述從載入<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>，和不相容的結構描述和結構描述具有遺失或其他資料行，接著處理。

trans-unit.source: The example then focuses on data issues, including handling the various loading options.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著著重於資料問題，包括處理各種載入選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> that provides a result set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />，提供結果集。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <see cref="T:System.Data.LoadOption" /> enumeration that indicates how rows already in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> are combined with incoming rows that share the same primary key.
trans-unit.target: 來自 <see cref="T:System.Data.LoadOption" /> 列舉的值，指出已經在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的資料列如何與共用相同主索引鍵的傳入資料列結合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler" /> delegate to call when an error occurs while loading data.
trans-unit.target: 載入資料時發生錯誤，要呼叫的 <see cref="T:System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Fills a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with values from a data source using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> using an error-handling delegate.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，以資料來源的值填滿 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />，使用錯誤處理委派。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method consumes the first result set from the loaded <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>, and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會使用第一個結果集從載入<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>，並成功完成之後，讀取器的位置設下一個結果集，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 轉換資料時`Load`方法會使用相同的轉換規則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> instance: schema, data, and event operations.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法必須考慮到三個特定的問題時載入的資料從<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>執行個體： 結構描述、 資料和事件的作業。

trans-unit.source: When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 當使用結構描述，`Load`方法可能會遇到的條件下, 表中所述。

trans-unit.source: The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述作業進行的所有匯入的結果集，即使沒有包含資料。

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has no schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>沒有結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會根據來自匯入的結果集的結構描述<xref:System.Data.IDataReader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>有結構描述，但它與載入結構描述不相容。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會擲回對應至特定錯誤的嘗試將資料載入至不相容的結構描述時，就會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that don't exist in the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述相容，但已載入的結果集結構描述包含資料行不存在於中`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method adds the extra column(s) to `DataTable`’s schema.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會將額外的資料行至`DataTable`的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and the loaded result set are not value compatible.
trans-unit.target: 在方法擲回例外狀況，如果對應中的資料行<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和載入的結果集不相容的值。

trans-unit.source: The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns.
trans-unit.target: 方法也會擷取結果集和所有加入的資料行的條件約束資訊。

trans-unit.source: Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current <xref:System.Data.DataTable> does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.
trans-unit.target: 此條件約束資訊的主索引鍵條件約束的情況下，除了用只有當目前<xref:System.Data.DataTable>不包含任何資料行，在載入作業的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述相容，但載入的結果集結構描述包含較少的資料行，比`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the `Load` method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or null value for the missing column.
trans-unit.target: 如果遺漏資料行已定義了預設值或資料行的資料類型可為 null，`Load`方法可讓資料列来加入，以取代遺失的資料行的預設值或 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If no default value or null can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用沒有預設值或 null，則`Load`方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the null value as the implied default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何特定的預設值，`Load`方法會使用隱含的預設值為 null 的值。

trans-unit.source: Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> maintains both the current value and the original value for each column.
trans-unit.target: 考慮的行為之前，先`Load`方法資料作業，請考慮每個資料列內<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會維護目前值和每個資料行的原始值。

trans-unit.source: These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可能會相等，或如果已變更過填滿的資料列中的資料可能會不同`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: See [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: In this method call, the specified <xref:System.Data.LoadOption> parameter influences the processing of the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 在這個方法呼叫中，指定<xref:System.Data.LoadOption>參數會影響連入資料的處理。

trans-unit.source: How should the Load method handle loading rows that have the same primary key as existing rows?
trans-unit.target: Load 方法應如何處理具有相同的主索引鍵為現有的資料列載入資料列？

trans-unit.source: Should it modify current values, original values, or both?
trans-unit.target: 它應該修改目前的值、 原始值，或兩者嗎？

trans-unit.source: These issues, and more, are controlled by the `loadOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這些問題，以及其他項目，皆受`loadOption`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row.
trans-unit.target: 如果現有的資料列和內送資料列包含對應的主索引鍵值，則會使用目前的資料列狀態值處理的資料列，否則它會被視為新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: In terms of event operations, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event occurs before each row is changed, and the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged> event occurs after each row has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 事件作業<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>之前變更每個資料列時，就會發生事件和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged>變更每個資料列之後，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs> instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，<xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataRowChangeEventArgs>傳遞至事件處理常式的執行個體包含與事件相關聯的特定動作的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This action value varies, depending on the state of the row before the load operation.
trans-unit.target: 此動作的值會根據的資料列之前載入作業的狀態而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，這兩個事件發生，而且動作是針對每個相同。

trans-unit.source: The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state.
trans-unit.target: 此動作可套用到每個資料列，目前或原始版本或兩者，根據目前的資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following table displays behavior for the Load method when called with each of the `LoadOption` values, and also shows how the values interact with the row state for the row being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示與每個呼叫時，Load 方法的行為`LoadOption`值，然後也會顯示這些值載入的資料列的資料列狀態的互動。

trans-unit.source: The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row.
trans-unit.target: （標示為"（不會出現） 」） 的最後一個資料列描述不符合任何現有的資料列的內送資料列的行為。

trans-unit.source: Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> for the value after the `Load` method has completed.
trans-unit.target: 此資料表中的每個資料格會描述資料列中欄位的目前和原始值連同<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>後的值為`Load`方法已完成。

trans-unit.source: Values in a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> can be constrained through use of properties such as <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>可以藉由使用屬性這類限制<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法會處理這類資料行與資料行的屬性所定義的行為一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: The read only constraint on a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is applicable only for changes that occur in memory.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的唯一條件約束上<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>只適用於記憶體中發生的變更。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法的覆寫唯讀資料行值，如有需要。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the OverwriteChanges or PreserveChanges options when calling the `Load` method, then the assumption is made that the incoming data is coming from the `DataTable`'s primary data source, and the DataTable tracks changes and can propagate the changes back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的 OverwriteChanges 或 PreserveChanges 選項呼叫時`Load`方法，則假設由內送資料來自`DataTable`的主要資料來源和資料表會追蹤變更，可以將傳播將變更傳回資料來源。

trans-unit.source: If you select the Upsert option, it is assumed that the data is coming from one of a secondary data source, such as data provided by a middle-tier component, perhaps altered by a user.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選取了選項，則會假設資料來自次要資料來源，例如資料由中介層元件，或許更改由使用者所提供的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the assumption is that the intent is to aggregate data from one or more data sources in the `DataTable`, and then perhaps propagate the data back to the primary data source.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，假設是目的是彙總資料一或多個資料來源中`DataTable`，，然後可能將傳播回主要資料來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.LoadOption> parameter is used for determining the specific version of the row that is to be used for primary key comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.LoadOption>參數用來判斷要用於主索引鍵比較的資料列的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: The table below provides the details.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Load option
trans-unit.target: 載入選項

trans-unit.source: DataRow version used for primary key comparison
trans-unit.target: 用於主索引鍵比較的 DataRow 版本

trans-unit.source: Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version
trans-unit.target: 原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本

trans-unit.source: Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version
trans-unit.target: 原始版本 （如果存在的話），否則目前的版本

trans-unit.source: Current version, if it exists, otherwise Original version
trans-unit.target: 目前版本 （如果存在的話），否則原始版本

trans-unit.source: The `errorHandler` parameter is a <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler> delegate that refers to a procedure that is called when an error occurs while loading data.
trans-unit.target: `errorHandler`參數是<xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler>載入資料時，發生錯誤時呼叫的程序是指的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs> parameter passed to the procedure provides properties that allow you to retrieve information about the error that occurred, the current row of data, and the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> being filled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs>參數傳遞至程序提供可讓您擷取發生的錯誤，目前的資料，資料列的相關資訊的屬性和<xref:System.Data.DataTable>被填入。

trans-unit.source: Using this delegate mechanism, rather than a simpler try/catch block, allows you to determine the error, handle the situation, and continue processing if you like.
trans-unit.target: 使用此委派機制，而不是簡單的 try/catch 區塊，可讓您判斷錯誤處理狀況，並繼續處理，如果您想。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs> parameter supplies a <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs.Continue%2A> property: set this property to `true` to indicate that you have handled the error and wish to continue processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs>參數提供<xref:System.Data.FillErrorEventArgs.Continue%2A>屬性： 將此屬性設定為`true`指出您已處理錯誤，而且想要繼續處理。

trans-unit.source: Set the property to `false` to indicate that you wish to halt processing.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性設定為`false`指出您想要停止處理。

trans-unit.source: Be aware that setting the property to `false` causes the code that triggered the problem to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，將屬性設`false`導致觸發要擲回例外狀況的問題將程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Finds and updates a specific row.
trans-unit.target: 尋找並更新特定資料列。

trans-unit.source: If no matching row is found, a new row is created using the given values.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到符合的資料列，則使用指定值來建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: An array of values used to create the new row.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立新資料列的值陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to accept changes; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要接受變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Finds and updates a specific row.
trans-unit.target: 尋找並更新特定資料列。

trans-unit.source: If no matching row is found, a new row is created using the given values.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到符合的資料列，則使用指定值來建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>方法會採用值的陣列，並在主索引鍵資料行中尋找相符的值。

trans-unit.source: If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料行有預設值，傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定該資料行的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a column has its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果資料行其<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>屬性設為 true，則傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定自動產生資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: If the `fAcceptChanges` parameter is `true` or not specified, the new data is added and then <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> is called to accept all changes in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>; if the argument is `false`, newly added rows are marked as insertions, and changes to existing rows are marked as modifications.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fAcceptChanges`參數是`true`或未指定，會加入新的資料，然後<xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>呼叫可接受中的所有變更<xref:System.Data.DataTable>; 如果引數是`false`，新加入的資料列標示為插入，而且會變更現有的資料列都會標示為修改。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions can also occur during either a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，也會發生在其中<xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，資料列不會加入至資料表。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>搭配<xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> method to attempt to find a row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>方法，以嘗試尋找一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: If no such row is found, the values are used to create a new row.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到這類的資料列，這些值可用來建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The array is larger than the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 陣列大於資料表中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: A value doesn't match its respective column type.
trans-unit.target: 數值不符合其個別的資料行型別。

trans-unit.source: Adding the row invalidates a constraint.
trans-unit.target: 加入資料列會使條件約束失效。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to put a null in a column where <see cref="P:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull" /> is false.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 Null 置於 <see cref="P:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull" /> 為 False 的資料行中。

trans-unit.source: An array of values used to create the new row.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立新資料列的值陣列。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine how the array values are applied to the corresponding values in an existing row.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷陣列值如何套用至現有資料列中對應的值。

trans-unit.source: Finds and updates a specific row.
trans-unit.target: 尋找並更新特定資料列。

trans-unit.source: If no matching row is found, a new row is created using the given values.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到符合的資料列，則使用指定值來建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>方法會採用值的陣列，並在主索引鍵資料行中尋找相符的值。

trans-unit.source: If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料行有預設值，傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定該資料行的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a column has its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果資料行其<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>屬性設為 true，則傳遞 null 值的陣列中要設定自動產生資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `loadOption` parameter is used to determine how the values in the array are applied to an existing row.
trans-unit.target: 值`loadOption`參數用來判斷陣列中的值如何套用至現有的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `loadOption` is set to `OverwriteChanges`, the `Original` and `Current` values of each column are replaced with the values in the incoming row and the `RowState` property is set to `Unchanged`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`loadOption`設為`OverwriteChanges`、`Original`和`Current`每個資料行的值會取代中的內送資料列的值和`RowState`屬性設定為`Unchanged`。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions can also occur during either a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，也會發生在其中<xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，資料列不會加入至資料表。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>搭配<xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the locale information used to compare strings within the table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在資料表中比較字串的地區設定 (Locale) 資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that contains data about the user's machine locale.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，包含使用者電腦地區設定的資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> object's <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> (returned by the <see cref="P:System.Data.DataSet.Locale" /> property) to which the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> belongs; if the table doesn't belong to a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />, the default is the current system <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 所屬的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.Data.DataSet.Locale" /> (由 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 屬性傳回)，如果資料表不屬於 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />，則預設值是目前系統 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> represents the software preferences of a particular culture or community.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表特定文化特性或群體軟體喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: When used for string comparisons, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> affects sorting, comparisons, and filtering.
trans-unit.target: 用於字串比較時<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>會影響比較，排序和篩選。

trans-unit.source: In columns that contain expressions, the <xref:System.StringComparison.InvariantCulture> is used.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中包含的運算式，<xref:System.StringComparison.InvariantCulture>用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.StringComparison.CurrentCulture> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.StringComparison.CurrentCulture>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Locale%2A> and prints the ISO language name.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>透過<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Locale%2A>並列印 ISO 語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with the current <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 合併。

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: `Merge`方法用來合併兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>有大致相似的結構描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源的最新的資料。

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: 未受影響或包含子資料表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。

trans-unit.source: The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式示範的行為`missingSchemaAction`參數<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立兩個版本的相同資料表中，修改第二個版本的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會嘗試將第二個資料表合併到第一個。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of Merge.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用其中一種多載版本的合併。

trans-unit.source: For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to be merged with the current <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 合併。

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with the current <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 合併。

trans-unit.source: The Merge method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: Merge 方法用來合併兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>有大致相似的結構描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源的最新的資料。

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: 未受影響或包含子資料表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: `Merge`方法通常稱為結尾的一系列程序牽涉到驗證的變更、 重新調整錯誤、 變更，更新資料來源和最後重新整理現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved by default during the merge operation.
trans-unit.target: 當執行合併，現有的資料，在合併之前所做的變更會保留依預設，合併作業期間。

trans-unit.source: Developers can modify this behavior by calling one of the other two overloads for this method, and specifying a false value for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以呼叫其中一個其他兩個多載，此方法，並指定 false 值，以修改此行為`preserveChanges`參數。

trans-unit.source: In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is first invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，<xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>首次叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: That method returns a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> optimized for validating and merging.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>適合用來驗證和合併。

trans-unit.source: This second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object contains only the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 此第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件只包含<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件已變更，導致原始子集<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 這個子集通常比較小，因此更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier can then send back either a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新<xref:System.Data.DataTable>（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。

trans-unit.source: (For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> can be merged back into the client application's original <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始<xref:System.Data.DataTable>與<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted`, is matched to target rows with the same primary key values.
trans-unit.target: 合併新的來源時<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目標，任何來源的資料列與<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`，對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。

trans-unit.source: Source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows.
trans-unit.target: 來源的資料列<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following console application creates a simple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and adds data to the table.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式會建立簡單<xref:System.Data.DataTable>並且將資料加入至資料表。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a copy of the table, adding rows to the copy.
trans-unit.target: 接著，範例會建立一份資料表，並加入資料列的複本。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example calls the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method to merge the data in the second table with the data in the first table.
trans-unit.target: 最後，此範例會呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法，將合併的第二個資料表中的資料，第一個資料表中的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="DataTable" /> to be merged with the current <see langword="DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DataTable" />，要與目前的 <see langword="DataTable" /> 合併。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, to preserve changes in the current <see langword="DataTable" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.<see langword="" />
trans-unit.target: 若要保留目前 <see langword="DataTable" /> 中的變更，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。<see langword="" />

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with the current <see langword="DataTable" />, indicating whether to preserve changes in the current <see langword="DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 合併指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 與目前的 <see langword="DataTable" />，指出是否保留目前 <see langword="DataTable" /> 中的變更。

trans-unit.source: The Merge method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: Merge 方法用來合併兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>有大致相似的結構描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源的最新的資料。

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: 未受影響或包含子資料表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: `Merge`方法通常稱為結尾的一系列程序牽涉到驗證的變更、 重新調整錯誤、 變更，更新資料來源和最後重新整理現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved during the merge operation unless the developer specifies false for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 除非開發人員會指定為 false 時執行合併，現有的資料，在合併之前所做的變更會保留在合併作業期間`preserveChanges`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `true`, incoming values do not overwrite existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`true`，內送值不會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `false`, incoming values do overwrite the existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`false`，內送值就會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row versions, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料列版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)。

trans-unit.source: In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is first invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，<xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>首次叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: That method returns a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> optimized for validating and merging.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>適合用來驗證和合併。

trans-unit.source: This second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object contains only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 此第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件已變更，導致原始子集<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This subset is generally smaller, and thus this subset is more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 這個子集是容量較小時，因此這個子集更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier can then send back either a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新<xref:System.Data.DataTable>（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。

trans-unit.source: (For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> can be merged back into the client application's original <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始<xref:System.Data.DataTable>與<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values.
trans-unit.target: 合併新的來源時<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目標，任何來源的資料列與<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`會對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。

trans-unit.source: Source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows.
trans-unit.target: 來源的資料列<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following console application creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing rows, modifies some of the data in those rows, and attempts to merge data from a different <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含資料列，修改這些資料列中的資料部分，並嘗試從不同的資料合併<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates the different behaviors for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範不同的行為，如`preserveChanges`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to be merged with the current <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 合併。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, to preserve changes in the current <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留目前 <see langword="true" /> 中的變更，則為 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with the current <see langword="DataTable" />, indicating whether to preserve changes and how to handle missing schema in the current <see langword="DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 合併指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 與目前的 <see langword="DataTable" />，指出是否保留變更，以及如何處理目前在 <see langword="DataTable" /> 中缺少的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: `Merge`方法用來合併兩個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>有大致相似的結構描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併至現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源的最新的資料。

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 「 合併 」 作業會列入考量，只有原始資料表，以及要合併的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: 未受影響或包含子資料表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料表有一或多個定義為關聯性，一部分的子資料表必須個別合併每一個子資料表。

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: `Merge`方法通常稱為結尾的一系列程序牽涉到驗證的變更、 重新調整錯誤、 變更，更新資料來源和最後重新整理現有<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved during the merge operation unless the developer specifies false for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 除非開發人員會指定為 false 時執行合併，現有的資料，在合併之前所做的變更會保留在合併作業期間`preserveChanges`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `true`, incoming values do not overwrite existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`true`，內送值不會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `false`, incoming values do overwrite the existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: 如果`preserveChanges`參數設定為`false`，內送值就會覆寫現有的資料列的目前資料列版本中現有的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row versions, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料列版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料列狀態和資料列版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)。

trans-unit.source: In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端應用程式，則通常會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下收集變更的資料，再將它傳送回中介層元件進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is first invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，<xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>首次叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: That method returns a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> optimized for validating and merging.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>適合用來驗證和合併。

trans-unit.source: This second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object contains only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 此第二個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>和<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件已變更，導致原始子集<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This subset is generally smaller, and thus this subset is more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: 這個子集是容量較小時，因此這個子集更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The middle tier can then send back either a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新<xref:System.Data.DataTable>（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或可重新傳送的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。

trans-unit.source: (For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> can be merged back into the client application's original <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始<xref:System.Data.DataTable>與<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method is called, the schemas of the two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects are compared, because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已經變更。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能已新增至 XML 結構描述自動化程序。

trans-unit.source: If the source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contains schema elements (added <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含結構描述項目 (加入<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>物件) 中遺失目標中，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增至目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the merged <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contains the added schema and data.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，合併<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含新增結構描述和資料。

trans-unit.source: After merging schemas, the data is merged.
trans-unit.target: 合併結構描述後, 資料會合併。

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values.
trans-unit.target: 合併新的來源時<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目標，任何來源的資料列與<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`會對應到相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。

trans-unit.source: Source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows.
trans-unit.target: 來源的資料列<xref:System.Data.DataRowState>值`Added`會對應到新的目標資料列與相同的主索引鍵值為新的來源資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列主控台應用程式示範的行為`missingSchemaAction`參數<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立兩個版本的相同資料表中，修改第二個版本的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會嘗試將第二個資料表合併到第一個。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial starting size for this table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個資料表的初始開始大小。

trans-unit.source: The initial starting size in rows of this table.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料表的資料列中的初始開始大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 50.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 50。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.MinimumCapacity%2A> allows the system to create an appropriate set of resources before fetching data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.MinimumCapacity%2A>可讓系統擷取資料之前建立一組適合的資源。

trans-unit.source: In a situation when performance is critical, setting this property can optimize performance.
trans-unit.target: 情況下效能很重要，設定這個屬性可以讓效能最佳化。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.MinimumCapacity%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.MinimumCapacity%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the XML representation of the data stored in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 為在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中所儲存資料的 XML 表示取得或設定命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> with the same schema as the table.
trans-unit.target: 使用與資料表相同的結構描述來建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> with the same schema as the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />，具有與 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 相同的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method to create new <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects with the same schema as the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>方法來建立新<xref:System.Data.DataRow>具有相同結構描述物件<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: After creating a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, you can add it to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>, through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在建立之後<xref:System.Data.DataRow>，您可以將它加入至<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>，到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> to create new rows, the rows must be added to or deleted from the data table before you call <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>若要建立新的資料列，資料列必須加入或刪除資料表，才能呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, adds two <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects that determine the table's schema, and creates several new <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects using the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，加入兩個<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>物件，可判斷資料表的結構描述，並建立數個新<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件，使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Those <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects are then added to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> using the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Data.DataRow>物件會加入至<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>使用<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that describes the size of the array.
trans-unit.target: 描述陣列大小的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The new array.
trans-unit.target: 新陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowBuilder" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new row from an existing row.
trans-unit.target: 從現有的資料列建立新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 衍生類別。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumnChangeEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 如需概觀，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableCleared> event, which is fired immediately after all rows have been successfully cleared but before the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A> method returns control back to the caller.
